title: Drawing, "Ash Tray, Two Versions", ca. 1930
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 3; lower center from left to right: #/6245 [circled], #6246 [circled]; lower right: SCALE 1 1/2" - 1'0"; dimensions and instructions in graphite throughout.
description: Plan and elevation for two versions of an ashtray/end table. Table at left has round glass top with round ash tray recessed into center of table. Tubular metal pedestal support and wood base. Table at right has round glass top and three thin tubular metal legs. Round ash tray extends above surface of table and supported by tubular metal pedestal.
